verses.kjv: The elder unto the elect lady and her children, whom I love in the truth; and not I only, but also all they that have known the truth;
verses.ct: From the elder, to the chosen lady and her children, whom I genuinely love — and not just me, but everyone who has come to know the truth.

verses.kjv: For the truth’s sake, which dwelleth in us, and shall be with us for ever.
verses.ct: We love you because of the truth that lives in us and will remain with us forever.

verses.kjv: Grace be with you, mercy, and peace, from God the Father, and from the Lord Jesus Christ, the Son of the Father, in truth and love.
verses.ct: Grace, mercy, and peace will be with you from God the Father and from the Lord Jesus Christ, the Father's Son, in truth and love.

verses.kjv: I rejoiced greatly that I found of thy children walking in truth, as we have received a commandment from the Father.
verses.ct: It brought me tremendous joy to discover that some of your children are living according to the truth, just as the Father commanded us.

verses.kjv: And now I beseech thee, lady, not as though I wrote a new commandment unto thee, but that which we had from the beginning, that we love one another.
verses.ct: So now I'm asking you, dear lady — not writing some new commandment, but the same one we've had from the very start — that we love each other.

verses.kjv: And this is love, that we walk after his commandments. This is the commandment, That, as ye have heard from the beginning, ye should walk in it.
verses.ct: This is what love means: that we live according to his commandments. And this is the commandment you've heard from the beginning — that you should live by it.

verses.kjv: For many deceivers are entered into the world, who confess not that Jesus Christ is come in the flesh. This is a deceiver and an antichrist.
verses.ct: Many deceivers have gone out into the world — people who refuse to acknowledge that Jesus Christ came in a physical body. Anyone like this is a deceiver and an antichrist.

verses.kjv: Look to yourselves, that we lose not those things which we have wrought, but that we receive a full reward.
verses.ct: Be on your guard, so that you don't lose what we've worked for, but instead receive your complete reward.

verses.kjv: Whosoever transgresseth, and abideth not in the doctrine of Christ, hath not God. He that abideth in the doctrine of Christ, he hath both the Father and the Son.
verses.ct: Whoever goes beyond the teaching and doesn't remain in the doctrine of Christ does not have God. The person who remains in the doctrine of Christ has both the Father and the Son.

verses.kjv: If there come any unto you, and bring not this doctrine, receive him not into your house, neither bid him God speed:
verses.ct: If someone comes to you and doesn't carry this doctrine, don't welcome them into your home or offer them any encouragement.

verses.kjv: For he that biddeth him God speed is partaker of his evil deeds.
verses.ct: Because whoever encourages such a person becomes a partner in their evil actions.

verses.kjv: Having many things to write unto you, I would not write with paper and ink: but I trust to come unto you, and speak face to face, that our joy may be full.
verses.ct: I have so much more to say to you, but I'd rather not put it in a letter. Instead, I hope to visit you and talk with you in person, so that our joy will be complete.

verses.kjv: The children of thy elect sister greet thee. Amen.
verses.ct: The children of your chosen sister send their greetings. Amen.
